c74object.name: flowSwing.stepUI
c74object.description: Edits per-breakpoint parameters alongside flowSwing.envelop or flowSwing.nested
c74object.discussion:
FlowSwing Overview
FlowSwing is based on Non-Isochronous (NI) Grids. It re-shapes control signals and the timing of sequences through flexible, dynamic timing structures that go beyond traditional meter. At its core, FlowSwing uses a small number of parameters to define grids generated by morphing between two isochronous pulses. These Non-Isochronous Grids are made of two beat durations (Short and Long), distributed as evenly as possible over a cycle, that can be dynamically modulated during performance.
flowSwing.stepUI is part of the FlowSwing package.

inlet.digest: list of y values or messages to set parameters

outlet.digest: step been edited with the mouse

digest.p: left inlet: Sets the times of steps in the range [0-1]. The length of the list determines the number of steps.
right inlet: Sets the y values of the steps. The length of the list must match the length of the next list in the left inlet.

method.name: zoom_x
method.digest: left inlet: Sets the zoom range in the x axis as a list of two values [min max] between 0 and 1.

method.name: color
method.digest: right inlet: sets the color of the steps lines. Values are RGB triplet as floats.

method.name: floatmode
method.digest: right inlet: sets the float mode. When disabled (0) [default], only integer values are allowed. When enabled (1), float values are allowed.

method.name: format
method.description:
right inlet: sets the appearance of the number box that displays the y value of the currently edited step.
0 - Decimal (Integer)
Display and output int values as decimal (base 10) numbers
1 - Hex
Display and output int values as hex (base 16) numbers
2 - Roland Octal
Display and output int values using a display format where digits range from 1 to 8, where 11 is zero 88 is 63 in decimal.
3 - Binary
Display and output int values using a binary display format of 1s and 0s.
4 - MIDI
Display and output int values using MIDI note names, where middle C (60) is C3.
5 - MIDI (C4)
Display and output int values using MIDI note names, where middle C (60) is C4.
6 - Decimal (Floating-Point)
Display and output float values

method.name: grid
method.digest: right inlet: sets the horizontal grid locations range.

method.name: range
method.digest: right inlet: sets the vertical range of the y axis as a list of two values [min max].

method.name: pattrstorge messages
method.digest: right inlet: messages to pattrhub such as getstate.

entry.name: Right
entry.digest: list of y values or messages to set parameters

entry.name: middle
entry.description:
The active message is reports information on the step being edited with the mouse.
Format: step index, y value
The released message is sent when the mouse button is released after editing a step.

entry.name: right
entry.description:
reports the state of the pattrstorage parameters
Format: parameter name, value
